processType.description: Type of ALE process, either thermal or plasma-based.

chemicalPrecursors.description: List of chemical precursors used in the ALE process, e.g., Cl2, HF, F2, propene, CO, Al(CH3)3.

energySource.description: Type of energy source used, e.g., thermal energy, plasma excitation, or photo-assisted.

substrateMaterial.description: Material of the substrate being etched, e.g., semiconductor, dielectric, or metal film.

temperature.description: Temperature at which the ALE process is conducted.

precursorGasFlowRate.description: Flow rate of precursor gas in standard cubic centimeters per minute (sccm).

carrierGasFlowRate.description: Flow rate of carrier gas in standard cubic centimeters per minute (sccm).

plasmaPower.description: Power of plasma used in plasma-enhanced ALE, in watts.

exposureTime.description: Duration of exposure for each cycle in seconds.

chlorinationEnergy.description: Energy used during the chlorination step, influencing Cl adsorption and penetration.

bombardmentEnergy.description: Energy of ions used during the bombardment phase, affecting the etch rate.

etchRate.description: Rate of etching per cycle or per unit time.

photoAssistedEnergy.description: Energy contribution from plasma-generated photons in photo-assisted ALE, influencing desorption dynamics.

selfLimitingReaction.description: Indicates whether the reaction is self-limiting, preventing continuous etching.

fluorinationMechanism.description: Description of the fluorination mechanism, e.g., HF adsorption and AlF3 layer formation.

ionDose.description: Ion dose required to remove one monolayer of material, in ions/cm².

argonIonFluence.description: Fluence of argon ions used in the process, in ions/cm².

chlorineExposure.description: Amount of chlorine exposure in terms of impacts or fluence.

hfCoverage.description: Coverage of HF on the substrate surface, in HF/nm².

h2oFormation.description: Indicates whether H2O formation occurs spontaneously during the process.

h2o2Formation.description: Indicates whether H2O2 formation occurs spontaneously during the process.

selfLimiting.description: Free energy change for self-limiting reactions.

chemicalVaporEtch.description: Free energy change for chemical vapor etch reactions.

minimumThermodynamicBarrier.description: Minimum thermodynamic barrier to transition from self-limiting to chemical vapor etch.

reactionFreeEnergy.description: Free energy profiles for different reaction pathways.

etchedMaterial.description: Description of the material that has been etched at the atomic scale.

byProducts.description: List of volatile compounds produced as by-products that need to be evacuated.

surfaceModifications.description: Description of chemical modifications on the surface post-etching.

surfaceRoughness.description: RMS surface roughness after the ALE process.

methodology.description: Description of the simulation methodology used, e.g., DFT with specific functional.

decompositionMechanisms.description: Description of decomposition and binding/chemisorption mechanisms.

excitationDynamics.description: Study of photon excitation effects on reaction mechanisms.

surfaceDesorptionRates.description: Rates of desorption, diffusion, and reaction on the surface.

bindingAffinity.description: Energy barriers and likelihood of adsorbate binding to the surface.

uniformity.description: Uniformity of the film after etching.

roughness.description: Roughness of the film surface post-etching.

temperatureProfile.description: Thermal conduction and temperature profile of the film.

chemicalComposition.description: Elemental analysis of the film's chemical composition.

gapDistance.description: Gap distance in the reactor, in micrometers.

purgeFlowRate.description: Flow rate of purge gas in sccm.

substrateVelocity.description: Velocity of the substrate in the reactor, in centimeters per second.

vacuumPressure.description: Vacuum pressure in the reactor, in Pascals.
